Text:
@horald: Listen you stupid faktard, all my torrents were seeded long ago, and I made sure several seeders have it before I stopped seeding, all my torrents are legit,  I stopped seeding because in my Country Bolivia the internet bandwidth is expensive and I only get 160 Kbps download and about 56Kbps upload, so I need to stop seeding in order to download other torrents, how do you know my torrents are fake? you probably say they're fake because you can't download them, you're a ignorant dumbass that writes shit out of ignorance because you can't think in the proper way to say things, get a clue of torrent terminology before "opening your big mouth". How do you know I "log people's IP", how do you know I "scam" them? you don't, you don't know me in real-life, if you did you'd know I don't, never had and wouldn't, you write shit, that's what you do, you're a big mouth asshole
asshole
asshole


@All: I'll have more bandwidth in July, better seeding hopefully.

Don't listen to this idiot 'horald', he doesn't even have any files seeded in TPB. He tried to download the files 2 minutes after I published it and I started to seeding hours later because of my limited bandwidth I need to stop seeding for many reasons, this dumbass is only frustrated and came here to write shit so I can hurry to seed it again, just ignore morons like this one.

Everyone stopped downloading at 1.7% because you believe and idiot that doesn't have a single torrent  here? well don't, I took really long time to have the whole file, mostly was stuck at 96.xx% now is complete and I added more trackers so it has better seeding and announced it in 'Suprbay.org' too, I seeded exclusively last 18 hours and almost nobody downloaded it, only 5 people. Many had the original unfinished now thanks to me and few other seeders they've downloaded but not seeded for long the original (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5271090/The.Biography.Channel.Dana.Plato.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM), I'm still seeding it that one anyway.

The .rar files are untouched, you can check their integrity with the .sfv file, the movie has great video and audio, I loved Dana Plato and I loved seeing her sad Biography to know more about her.

Don't believe everyone who writes comments, I'll have it seeding a few days, just to show you I'm telling the truth, just download it and see for your self.
